channel.title: CVE Feed for Syam Mohan -- WPFront Notification Bar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Syam Mohan -- WPFront Notification Bar

item.title: CVE-2024-29819|2024-08-02T01:17:58.051Z -- syam%20mohan -- wpfront%20notification%20bar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Syam Mohan WPFront Notification Bar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WPFront Notification Bar: from n/a through 3.3.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-29819|2024-03-27T10:15:36.538Z -- syam%20mohan -- wpfront%20notification%20bar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Syam Mohan WPFront Notification Bar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WPFront Notification Bar: from n/a through 3.3.2.
